snippet.title: Aethermancer - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into Aethermancer and what you can expect from the gameplay of this upcoming monster-taming roguelite game. The trailer showcases some of the mythical creatures you'll find, combat, elemental attacks, aether management, and more. Aethermancer will be available on PC and Nintendo Switch. A closed alpha for Aethermancer is available now.

Become the Aethermancer and fight alongside mythical creatures. Explore the ever-changing Fractured Ruins. Plan your moves in challenging turn-based battles utilizing the four elements of Aether. Watch your Monsters grow stronger from previous lives and defy death!
